LanguageData.Plant_Chanterelle_Westerado.label: chanterelle
LanguageData.Plant_Chanterelle_Westerado.description: Wild chanterelle. Useful as a meat-substitute. Grows anywhere there is a little light and minimally fertile ground.
LanguageData.Plant_ParasolMushroom_Westerado.label: proud mountain-shroom
LanguageData.Plant_ParasolMushroom_Westerado.descript: Wild proud mountain-shroom. Useful as a meat-substitute. Grows anywhere there is a little light and minimally fertile ground.
LanguageData.Plant_Lavender_Westerado.label: lavender
LanguageData.Plant_Lavender_Westerado.description: Thorny, woody shoots covered with leaves and pleasant flowers. Has a nice fragrance.
